duration_in_months: My Department is responsible for enterprise fleet and facilities management and delivery of service to acquired national assets. Hazardous waste management of lead is indeed a priority. The RCMP will be the end user of services. All "story**<|reserved_special_token_16|>,
full_summary:
### M5000-222040 Lead Removal Services

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3784424838
* **Reference Number**: WS3784424838-Doc3787148453
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-01-18 (14:00 HNC)
* **Amendment Number**: 0

#### Notice Type and Category

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

#### Goods and Services

* **UNSPSC**: 76121900 - Hazardous Waste Disposal (Enlèvement des déchets dangereux)

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Regions of Opportunities

> Saskatchewan

#### Regions of Delivery

> Saskatchewan

#### Contractor Information

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

> 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
> Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
> Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Name**: Danielle Graham (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [danielle.graham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.graham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Description

Please disregard the original closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 18, 2023, at 14:00 HNC. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.
